title: List of CDM entities
description: This JSON schema is adopted by content providers exposing CDM entities. Instances of this schema must not contain more than one site.

anyOf.title: urltemplate
anyOf.description: URL Template allows integration of remote apps cross technologies

identification.title: identification
identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language
Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

id.description: ID of the entity; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the entity and unique per entity type exposed via the same content channel

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

urlTemplate.description: URL template string, based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6570

parameters.description: Parameters configuration for the given template

names.description: Parameters names for the given URL Template, will be available for use in the template string

oneOf.description: A string value of the
A plain string value or reference pointer - the actual value will be taken from there
A boolean in case of 'boolean' parameter
A plain string value or reference pointer - the actual value will be taken from there
A boolean in case of 'boolean' parameter

renameTo.description: Used for mapping of parameter names, useful in case the actual parameter key could not be defined in the utl template (e.g '-' is forbidden: sapSystem -> sap-system)

editor.description: Editor configuration for the given template

oneOf.description: A plain string value or reference pointer - the actual value will be taken from there
A boolean in case of 'boolean' parameter

type.description: The type of the parameter: 'plain' - literal string value | 'reference' - pointing to some value | 'map' - key-value object which stores values

oneOf.description: A plain string value or reference pointer - the actual value will be taken from there
A boolean in case of 'boolean' parameter

value.description: Holds a default value for the parameter

renameTo.description: Used for mapping of parameter names, useful in case the actual parameter key could not be defined in the utl template (e.g '-' is forbidden: sapSystem -> sap-system)

required.description: A flag which makes this parameter required, means the application must provide it

label.description: A reference to a label to render in designtime, aside the input

order.description: The order of the element in designtime tool (0-n)

blocked.description: A flag which makes this ui control blocked for editing in Edit mode in designtime

uiTech.description: The relevant UI technology/ies which is served using this template. the template would be available for systems configured with these UI technologies

capabilities.description: UI technology capabilities of the corresponding app

oneOf.description: Boolean flag, protocol would be 'FLP' in this case
Configuration object, enables to configure a protocol (FLP is default)

navigationMode.description: Navigation mode of the target application. ('inplace'/'explace'/'newWindow'/'newWindowThenEmbedded' were deprecated and exist only for compatibility)

items.description: Navigation mode of the target application. ('inplace'/'explace'/'newWindow'/'newWindowThenEmbedded' were deprecated and exist only for compatibility)

startMethod.description: The HTTP method to load the application with

deviceTypes.description: Represents device types for which application is developed

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true

parameters.description: Parameters configuration for the given template

names.description: Parameters names for the given URL Template, will be available for use in the template string

oneOf.description: A string value of the
A plain string value or reference pointer - the actual value will be taken from there
A boolean in case of 'boolean' parameter

A boolean in case of 'boolean' parameter

label.description: A reference to a label to render in designtime, aside the input

order.description: The order of the element in designtime tool (0-n)

blocked.description: A flag which makes this ui control blocked for editing in Edit mode in designtime

uiTech.description: The relevant UI technology/ies which is served using this template. the template would be available for systems configured with these UI technologies

capabilities.description: UI technology capabilities of the corresponding app

oneOf.description: Boolean flag, protocol would be 'FLP' in this case
Configuration object, enables to configure a protocol (FLP is default)

navigationMode.description: Navigation mode of the target application. ('inplace'/'explace'/'newWindow'/'newWindowThenEmbedded' were deprecated and exist only for compatibility)

items.description: Navigation mode of the target application. ('inplace'/'explace'/'newWindow'/'newWindowThenEmbedded' were deprecated and exist only for compatibility)

startMethod.description: The HTTP method to load the application with

deviceTypes.description: Represents device types for which application is developed

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary

anyOf.title: businessapp
anyOf.description: Business App defines the target, navigation, ui and integration attributes of an application

identification.title: identification
identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language
Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

id.description: ID of the entity; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the entity and unique per entity type exposed via the same content channel

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

commonAppConfig.description: App Descriptor structure extended with sap.integration for URL template information

reference.description: A reference to the corresponding Application

urlTemplateId.description: Reference to the desired URL Template

urlTemplateParams.description: Parameters for the corresponding URL Template

urlTemplateId.description: Reference to the desired URL Template

urlTemplateParams.description: Parameters for the corresponding URL Template

urlTemplateDestination.description: Represents a system alias to be used for resolving this URL template

id.description: Represents mandatory unique app identifier which must correspond to component 'id/namespace'

type.description: Represents type of an application and can be application or component or library

oneOf.description: Represents the object detailing the properties of the language handling

bundleUrl.description: Represents path inside the app to the properties file containing text symbols for the Descriptor

supportedLocales.description: An array of locale names which are supported

oneOf.description: Represents path inside the app to the properties file containing text symbols for the Descriptor

applicationVersion.description: Represents mandatory version of the app

dataSources.description: Represents used data sources with a unique key/alias

uri.description: Represents uri of the data source

type.description: Represents type of the data source. The supported types are OData, ODataAnnotation, INA, XML, JSON

settings.description: Represents data source type specific attributes (key, value pairs)

odataVersion.description: Represents version of OData: 2.0 is default

localUri.description: Represents path to local meta data document or annotation uri

annotations.description: Represents  array of annotation which references an existing data source of type ODataAnnotation

maxAge.description: Indicates that the client is unwilling to accept a response whose age is greater than the number of seconds specified in this field

crossNavigation.description: Represents cross navigation for inbound and outbound targets

inbounds.description: Represents cross navigation for inbound target

^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\.\\-]+$.description: The combination of semantic object, action and parameter signature must ensure that intent-based navigation requests always identify inbounds in the surrounding crossNavigation object in a non-ambiguous manner

action.description: Represents action an the semantic object

tileSize.description: Size of the tile on the homepage

title.description: Represents language-dependent mandatory title, for example 'create Purchase Order'

shortTitle.description: Represents a short version of the language-dependent title, for example 'create'

subTitle.description: Represents language-dependent additional information to the title and can overwrite subTitle from sap.app definition

deviceTypes.description: Represents device types for which application is developed

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true

value.description: Represents a depending on format either a verbatim default value or a reference

format.description: Indicates how 'value' is to be interpreted: ('plain': the 'value' is taken as a literal string value| 'reference': the 'value' is a reference to e.g. a UserDefault parameter (e.g. 'UserDefault.CostCenter'), the resolved parameter value is used)

filter.description: Represents a filter , only if input parameter matches filter

value.description: Represents a depending on format either a verbatim filter value, a regular expression or a reference

format.description: Indicates how 'value' is to be interpreted: ('plain': the actual value must match the 'value' property directly| 'regexp': the 'value' represents a regexp which must be present in the actual value| 'reference' : the 'value' represents a reference to e.g. a UserDefault parameter (e.g. 'UserDefault.CostCenter'), the resolved parameter value is then directly compared with the actual value)

launcherValue.description: Represents a value to be used when creating a tile intent for this inbound

oneOf.description: Represents the definition of a single-value tile intent parameter; format property must be 'plain' in this case
Represents the definition of a multi-value tile intent parameter; format property must be 'array' in this case

format.description: Indicates how 'value' is to be interpreted: 'plain': the 'value' is taken as a literal string value | 'array': the 'value' is an array of strings

prompt.description: DEPRECATED - Indicates the administrator should be prompted to supply a value when creating a tile

renameTo.description: Represents the parameter name in legacy ABAP application, e.g. 'RF05L-BUKRS' for parameter 'CompanyCode'

additionalParameters.description: Indicates how additional parameters to the declared signature are treated: ('ignored': parameters are not passed on to application | 'allowed': parameters are passed on to application | 'notallowed': additional parameters are not allowed)

title.description: Represents a title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

info.description: Represents additional information to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

items.description: Represents a tag; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

technology.description: Represents UI technology. The possible values are UI5 (default), WDA, NWBC, GUI, URL and WCF

icons.description: Represents icons which used in application

favIcon.description: Represents ICO file to be used inside the browser and for desktop shortcuts

phone.description: Represents 57x57 pixel version for non-retina iPhones

phone@2.description: Represents 114x114 pixel version for non-retina iPhones

tablet.description: Represents 72x72 pixel version for non-retina iPads

tablet@2.description: Represents 144x144 pixel version for non-retina iPads

deviceTypes.description: Represents device types on which application is running. Supported device types are desktop, tablet and phone

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true

fullWidth.description: Indicates whether app should run in full screen mode: possible values: true or false

type.description: Represents the type of FLP entry. It must be 'application' or 'tile' or 'plugin'

config.description: Represents configuration parameters of the FLP entry

^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]*$.description: Represents the configuration key and values

url.description: The target URL which will be opened in a new tab

parameters.description: URL parameters which will be added to the URL on build, and will be omitted in RT format

dataSource.description: Data source for the indicator data source. If omitted, the address of the indicator data source is fully determined by the path

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

vizOptions.description: Options a visualization is offering with regards to rendering, for example

displayFormats.description: Defines what display formats a visualization type can render itself in. The value 'default' is deprecated - please use 'standard' instead!

sap.platform.cf.title: JSON schema for SAP.PLATFORM.CF Namespace
sap.platform.cf.description: Represents CF(Cloud Foundry) platform specific attributes

sap.url.title: JSON schema for SAP.URL Namespace
sap.url.description: Represents specific attributes for SAP URL

artifactId.description: Reference to an artifact declared as content item in the manifest of the content package that contains this visualization

baseURL.description: Location where to retrieve additional resources for the visualization, e.g. for card visualizations. The value is a URL that always ends with a slash; a relative URL also starts with a slash. If the value is a relative URL, it MUST be complemented by a property destination which takes a logical destination name as value

destination.description: Logical destination name, which must be provided in case the baseURL property is a relative URL

defaultViz.description: ID of the default visualization for the current application

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary

anyOf.title: role
anyOf.description: Roles define the set of apps that a user (with specific roles) is allowed to use

identification.description: Identifier and other meta attributes for roles; adapted ID character set from general definition found in `identification.json`

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language
Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

id.description: ID of the entity, needs to be unique across all roles in content package

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

catalogs.description: a list of the assigned content catalogs

groups.description: a list of the assigned groups

spaces.description: a list of the assigned spaces

apps.description: a list of the assigned business apps

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary

anyOf.title: group
anyOf.description: Groups define how and what visualizations of apps are grouped in the launchpad home page

identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

viz.description: a list of the assigned app visualizations

displayFormatHint.description: A hint for how this vizReference should be displayed; compact format could be rendered as link

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary

anyOf.title: catalog
anyOf.description: Catalogs define how and what visualizations of apps are grouped in the app-finder

identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

anyOf.title: space
anyOf.description: Spaces are grouping content, currently only pages

identification.title: identification
identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language
Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

id.description: ID of the entity; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the entity and unique per entity type exposed via the same content channel

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

title.description: Represents the title of the Space

description.description: Represents an additional description of the Space

mergeId.description: Entities of the same entity type with the same merge-ID may be merged

sortNumber.description: Determines an order of all spaces: The space comes after other spaces with smaller sortNumber and before spaces with larger sortNumber; spaces with no sort number come after all spaces with a sortNumber.

contentNodes.description: List of the assigned content nodes; so far restricted to a flat list of pages, might be extended in subsequent versions

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary

anyOf.title: page
anyOf.description: Pages define the layout of sections

identification.title: identification
identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language
Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

id.description: ID of the entity; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the entity and unique per entity type exposed via the same content channel

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

sections.description: a list of the assigned page sections

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

viz.description: a list of the assigned app visualizations

displayFormatHint.description: A hint for how this vizReference should be displayed; compact format could be rendered as link

mergeId.description: Entities of the same entity type with the same merge-ID may be merged

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary

anyOf.title: workpage
anyOf.description: Work pages define how visualizations are placed in a structure organized by rows, columns, and cells

identification.title: identification
identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language
Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

id.description: ID of the entity; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the entity and unique per entity type exposed via the same content channel

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

title.description: Represents the title of the WorkPage

description.description: Represents an additional description of the WorkPage

mergeId.description: Entities of the same entity type with the same merge-ID may be merged

id.description: ID of the row; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the row and unique in relation to all other rows contained in the same work page

rowConfig.title: Work Page Row Configuration
rowConfig.description: Configuration of a work page row

title.description: Represents the title of the Row

info.description: Represents an additional info of the Row shown next to the title

fillRowHeight.description: Indicates whether the last Widget contained in each Column->Cell of this Row should stretch to the height of the row. This visually unifies the height of all contents.

fullWidth.description: Visually expands the Rows width to the maximum available width. The expansion only applies to background setting

backgroundColor.description: CSS color value used as a background for this Row

backgroundURL.description: Url to a background image for this Row

paddingTop.description: Padding on top of the Row

paddingBottom.description: Padding on bottom of the Row

id.description: ID of the column; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the column and unique in relation to all other columns contained in the same work page

columnConfig.title: Work Page Column Configuration
columnConfig.description: Configuration of a work page column

columnWidth.description: An even number between 4 and 24 to indicate the width of the column. The columnWidth of all columns in a row should add up to 24

id.description: ID of the cell; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the cell and unique in relation to all other cells contained in the same work page

cellConfig.title: Work Page Cell Configuration
cellConfig.description: Configuration of a work page cell

items.description: widget as a usage of a visualization placed in a cell

id.description: ID of the widget; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the widget and unique in relation to all other widgets contained in the same work page

vizConfigAdaptations.description: Path/value pairs to overwrite the values of specified properties within the vizConfig object of the referenced visualization. All paths must start with a '/'. Values of the form {{<text-key>}} will be replaced by the corresponding language-specific text with that key in the text dictionary of the containing work page

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary

anyOf.title: site
anyOf.description: A site defines an entry point for users to work with CDM content. Only the first site entity in the CDM document will be considered, all further sites will be ignored

identification.title: identification
identification.description: CDM Identification defines identifiers and other meta attributes which are common for all entities

anyOf.description: Fixed, untranslated string in specific language
Fixed, untranslated string in specific language

id.description: ID of the entity; it needs to be stable over the entire lifecycle of the entity and unique per entity type exposed via the same content channel

providerId.description: The parent content provider of the entity

optimizedSiteLoading.description: Enables the caching of a site in the browser cache

asynchronousModuleLoading.description: When using asynchronous loading, the browser loads the site and apps that include SAPUI5 modules in parallel

browserFeatureAccess.description: Enables applications to access and use browser features, such as camera and geo location

personalizationSupported.description: Ensures that the App Finder and Edit Home Page options are visible in the user actions menu

themeSelectionSupported.description: Enables an end user to select a different theme

languageSelectionSupported.description: Enables an end user to select a different language for the site

supportedLanguages.description: List of languages the end user can select. Entries should a BCP47 language tags

sapMobileStartSupported.description: Enables users to install and register the mobile app at runtime

groupDisplayModeEnabled.description: Enables an end user to choose whether to show all groups at once (true) or show one group at a time (false) in the Home Page screen in the Settings dialog box

keyUserAdaptation.description: Enables key users to adapt the UI of HTML5 apps at runtime

sapCompanion.description: Enables in-app help from the ? icon in the UI shell header

sapCompanionParameters.description: JSON object with a map of parameter/value pairs that are required to retrieve the help content

sapDigitalAssistant.description: Enables the Digital Assistant in this site

launchpadViewMode.description: Mode how to display apps in the launchpad UI

showSourceSystemNames.description: Determines if source system information is shown on widgets. The information provided is the destination property (sap-provider-label) or the content provider ID when no value is defined. This setting is only relevant when Spaces and Pages view mode is switched on.

pageWidth.description: Defines the maximum width of a page that its content can fill. 'FullWidth' uses the complete width of the window. Large uses 1520px, 'Medium' uses 1200px. If the window size exceeds the sizes for Large and Medium the page content is centered by default.

showSearchInShellHeader.description: Ensures that the Search field appears in the shell header

showOrHideGroupsAndSections.description: Enables an end user to hide or show a group from their home page

showNotifications.description: Shows the Notifications icon in the launchpad shell bar

showAllMyApps.description: Displays the All My Apps navigation option

appFinder.description: Determines where the quick access to the App Finder appears

editHomePage.description: Determines where the quick access to Edit Home Page appears

settings.description: Determines where the quick access to the Settings screen appears

userHomepageSupported.description: Makes a personalizable homepage available to each end user

sessionTimeoutEnabled.description: Ensures that users are automatically logged out on session timeout

sessionDuration.description: Time in minutes that a session remains open when no actions are performed by the user. The duration must be shorter than that of the App Router

sessionTimeoutAlertTime.description: Time in minutes before the session times out to alert the user

items.description: Contains translation dictionary of a specific locale

locale.description: The locale of the specific translated dictionary
